original_text: And the Amorites were determined also to hold out in Mount Heres, Aijalon and Shaalbim, but when the power of the tribes of Joseph increased, they too were pressed into forced labor.
korean_text: 결심하고 헤레스 산과 아얄론과 사알빔에 거주하였더니 요셉의 가문의 힘이 강성하매 아모리 족속이 마침내는 노역을 하였으며

sentences.original_text: And the Amorites were determined also
to hold out in Mount Heres
but when the power of the tribes of Joseph increased
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 요셉 지파의 힘이 강해졌을 때

sentences.original_text: they too were pressed into forced labor
